original_text: God is preparing many good things for you in heaven. So you should be very happy when people do these bad things to any of you. People did these same things to God's prophets who lived long ago.’
korean_text: 기뻐하고 즐거워하라 하늘에서 너희의 상이 큼이라 너희 전에 있던 선지자들도 이같이 박해하였느니라

sentences.original_text: God is preparing many good things for you
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님은 너를 위해 많은 좋은 것들을 준비하고 계신다

sentences.original_text: So you should be very happy
when people do these bad things to any of you.
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들이 너희 중 누구에게 이런 나쁜 일을 할 때.
